short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: scroll related videos and comments on the youtube pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can see related videos and comments while watching videos on youtube.
Note: There is a slight bug in reading comments. When you scroll the entire page, the comments are read.
